QuestData.Title: Spray it Forward
QuestData.Description: My fellow siblings are already further down in the den trying to deal with these bugs, and they're starting to get overwhelmed. I say it's time to gas the place.$B$BTake these fumigators. Don't go setting them off yourself; it takes a highly trained professional, and proper timing. Just find my sisters and pass them out.$B$BRemma should be positioned closest to the entrance. Head down the corridor and keep to your right once you go down the ramp.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Box of Bugkill Fumigators to Remma Curtainfire inside the Ban'Thallow Barrow Den.
QuestData.RewardText: We're bringing out the bug spray, eh? I guess it can't be helped.
